title.rendered: The highlight of our week in Breckenridge!

content.rendered:
My husband, myself and our two grandchildren took the Brown Canyon rafting trip on Sunday, July 18, 2010.

The kids were fearless being already 9 and 11 and my husband was an experienced rafter but I felt panic stricken and really feared the experience.  It was just the 4 of us and our guide in one raft and we had to learn to paddle together in order to succeed.

This experience turned out to be the highlight of our week in Breckenridge, CO!   I know that I have never done anything in my life that was as much fun .  Our grandchildren are still telling everyone about their adventure.

Thank you AVA for helping to make a memorable trip to Colorado with our grandchildren even more memorable with your expert guides and equipment.

Susie Silverman
